This sample demonstrates how you can perform a network http request from your wearable device, using your paired phone. Click on the button below to lunch the app on your paired wearable device.
Google Api Client is not connected!
No wearable device with the requested capability was found!
Failed to launch the wearable app!

A simple app to demonstrate some of the features in the Wear Companion Library. You can drive this from both your phone or your wear device. On your mobile, select a page from the drawer.\n\nOn any mobile page, you can open the corresponding page on your wear device by pressing on the FAB button at the lower right corner of the page.
Below we track the information about the page that the wear app is currently showing. As you navigate through the wear app, the information below will change using the MessageApi calls.
You can listen to the MIC output streamed frm your wear device
